MODULE.name: EzNFC
MODULE.MORE_HELP: This is example of API. Implementation contain in extension.

PROPERTY.name: isEnabled
PROPERTY.DESC: returns is device NFC is enabled.

METHOD.name: enableAdapter
METHOD.DESC: Navigates to device NFC Adapter settings screen if device's NFC Adapter is not enabled

METHOD.name: enableRead
METHOD.DESC: Enables NFC read of the application if device is NFC supported

CALLBACK.DESC: List of callback data after the NFC Tag is read

PARAM.name: Type
PARAM.DESC: The Type of NFC Tag that has been read

PARAM.name: ID
PARAM.DESC: The ID of the Tag that has been read.

PARAM.name: Payload
PARAM.DESC: Payload is the data overall data of NFC Tag

PARAM.name: TNF
PARAM.DESC: TNF ia las 3 bits of Payload

PARAM.name: data
PARAM.DESC: The String data that is read from Tag.

METHOD.name: disableRead
METHOD.DESC: disables NFC read of the Application
